items.title: 4. Use the New Prop in the Block
6. Organize Proptypes with a Section Header
8. View Your Config in Site Designer

frontmatter.metaDescription: This how-to guide shows how to add new Element Proptypes to an existing Element Block React Component and organize them using an Element Proptype sectionHeader.
